articles.title: Deadpool 3 and Wicked trailers air in Super Bowl adverts - BBC.com
articles.description: Fans were given a first look at the upcoming films during Sunday night's NFL showdown.
articles.content:
By Noor NanjiCulture reporter
Ryan Reynolds stars as Deadpool joined by Hugh Jackman, back as Wolverine
Fans were given a first look at upcoming films including the Deadpool sequel and Wicked durin… [+2020 chars]

articles.author: Conor Murray
articles.title: Usher Overshadowed? New Beyoncé And Kanye West Releases Could Eat Into Traditional Super Bowl Halftime Sales Boost - Forbes
articles.description: Beyoncé dropped “Texas Hold ‘Em” and “16 Carriages,” two new songs from her forthcoming album, just minutes after Usher’s performance.
articles.content: Usher took the one of the largest stages in music to perform some of his biggest hits Sunday nightusually a guarantee of mega sales to followand although hes already rising on the sales and streaming… [+3670 chars]
